text: Ibrahim Ali Khan Pataudi (born 5 March 2001) is an Indian actor who works in Hindi films. He is the son of actors Saif Ali Khan and Amrita Singh. As a child, he played the younger version of his fatherâ€™s character in the film Tashan (2008). As an adult, he had his first main role in the Netflix romantic comedy film Nadaaniyan (2025).
